There's nothing really new for me to say about this masterpiece of a game. Two general things, though:

-Should I play 1 before 2?
A lot of people are going to say that you can directly go to 2. You can. But you'd miss out on a truly excellent game. I personally found 1 to be more focused than 2.

-I'm bad at puzzles!
The puzzles are introduced very gradually. The game does a brilliant job of keeping the learning curve accessible. You won't even realise when you've reached the really tricky puzzles.

11/10, would recommend.

after a long wait, i finally played one of the games that introduced me into the realm of Valve games. Even tho it aint that long, it's still a plessure to play even after the however many years its been out

INGREDIENTES
CREMA

1 TARRO DE LECHE CONDENSADA NESTL√â¬Æ

¬Ω CUCHARADITA DE CANELA EN POLVO

1 ¬Ω TAZA DE AGUA

2 CUCHARADAS SEMICOLMADAS DE MAICENA

MASA

1 KILO DE HARINA

250 ML DE AGUA UN TANTO TIBIA

60 G LEVADURA FRESCA

1 TAZA DE AZ√öCAR GRANULADA

4 HUEVOS

120 G DE MANTEQUILLA BATIDA ‚Äì ABLANDADA

1 CUCHARADITA DE SAL

2 CUCHARADITAS DE CANELA EN POLVO

100 G DE NUECES PARTIDAS

70 G DE PASAS

PREPARACI√ìN
En una olla mediana juntar la leche condensada NESTL√â¬Æ con el agua, la canela y la maicena. Lleva a fuego medio-alto revolviendo constantemente hasta que hierva y consigas una crema espesa. Una vez lista, retira del fuego y cubre con papel film al ras de la preparaci√≥n y enfria.

Mientras para la masa, juntar en un bowl la harina con el agua, la levadura y el az√∫car. Remueve hasta juntar y reposa la mezcla durante 20 min. Enseguida, agrega los huevos y amasa levemente. Finaliza con la mantequilla ablandada, la sal y la canela. Amasa nuevamente hasta obtener una masa compacta y una tanto el√°stica, reposa durante 15 min. Cubierta con un pa√±o.

Separa la masa en tres partes y uslerea sobre un mes√≥n levemente enharinado de manera rectangular, rellenar con la crema del paso uno ya fr√≠a o levemente tibia y esparce nueces y pasas con toques de canela en polvo. Enrolla y corta rodajas de dos cm de grosor aproximados. D√©jalas acostadas y un tanto separadas sobre una lata de horno previamente enmantequillada y fermenta durante 30 min.

Para el proceso de fermentaci√≥n debes dejarla dentro del horno muy suave con la puerta semi-abierta, as√≠ mantener una temperatura del 30 a 40¬∞C. Por otro lado debes cubrir los rollos de canela con un pl√°stico para generar h√∫medad. Con estos consejos logras un fermentado y as√≠ aumentas el volumen de las piezas. Una vez listo, retira con cuidado el pl√°stico y pinta la superficie con dora (1/2 taza de leche con una yema de huevo), espolvorea un toque de canela y lleva a horno pre-calentado a temperatura alta de 180¬∞C durante 25 minutos aproximados hasta aumentar su volumen y dorar la superficie. Una vez listos, retira del horno, enfr√≠a y disfruta tus rollos de canela.
What to say?  An underground hit that is now a classic.  Instant favorite for anyone who likes puzzle solving, with the bonus of the mysterious backstory of where you are, what is going on?
its the most amazing puzzle game ive ever played, highly recommend

Un juego de Puzzle divertido y con unos "experimentos" que te hacen pensar y actuar de manera precisa para poder completarlos. El final est√° "ok", aunque los cr√©ditos lo valen.

Si hay algo malo del juego, es que al pasar de "secci√≥n" suelen bajarse los frames por unos segundos, y que dura muy poco.

Recomendado en ofertas, y mas si es el pack que trae tambi√©n el Portal 2.

Portal is an experience.

You should totally buy it.

Super fun and satisfying puzzle game that gets harder as you play. There is nothing more satisfying then solving a difficult level here. And the closer you get to the end, the more it turns from an ordinary puzzle game to a high stakes terrifying puzzle game. I love it!

Loved the game all the way through. Personally I am not a fan of puzzle games but the portal series is an exception. It isn't too difficult or challenging, but has a great funny/charming story.
One other thing it is one of those 'short but sweet games'. This is not a big deal considering the game is now so cheap during sales.

I am sure that there are scores of thousands of reviews for Portal on line already, but thought I would add my vote to the ocean of affirmations of this delightful game.  it is imaginative and challenging without being overly difficult.  It is a fun romp into Newtonian equations of motion; using physics concepts of gravity, mass, velocity and acceleration.  The idea of opening and moving portals to employ those concepts to achieve objectives and move forward is wonderful.  The story line is delightful and the arena is very well developed and exciting to explore.  Definitely a game worth having and revisiting!
Ziemlich cool. Portal 3 w√§re auch cool, Valve.
A true classic. Love playing it.
I literally bought the games for a friend so we can play together. Portal IS amazing. Hoopy the hoop was ok, also, the cake IS a lie. :D amazing puzzles though. Portal 3? ;)

A classic game that is lots of fun. Pick it up on sale and you won't regret it. It is a bit short, but still worth playing before delving into Portal 2.

Ap√≥s v√°rias indica√ß√µes de youtubers q eu assisto e gosto do conte√∫do, joguei, desbravei e zerei Portal. √Ä come√ßar pela sua mec√¢nica genial de criar portais (especificamente 2) para passar pelos desafios, fazendo com q abra um leque infinito de possibilidades q; apesar de ser manjado hoje em dia e ser considerado "simples", na √©poca q esse jogo foi lan√ßado, assim como o half-life, foi totalmente inovador na sua √©p√≥ca e at√© hoje esses jogos q a Valve produziu s√£o bastante respeitados entre a maioria dos games (maioria pois ainda existem os fan boys de console), eu, que joguei √† mais de ou quase 10 anos depois de seu lan√ßamento pude me divertir do mesmo jeito do q bastante jogos de hoje em dia; sem falar do seu level design, enredo bastante misterioso e intrigante, e personagens carism√°ticos (at√© mesmo aqueles q n√£o falam muito como a pr√≥pria shell). Esse tipo de jogo eu gosto de classificar de "novo cl√°ssico", porque apesar de sido lan√ßado a um tempo relativamente curto, foi e ser√° lembrado por anos como os jogos das gera√ß√µes passadas 16-bits e etc. Recomendo esse novo cl√°ssico aos meus amigos e as pessoas q tiveram saco para ler at√© o final dessa "review"(q na real s√≥ foi eu dando minha opini√£o), comprem esse jogo sem medo e aproveitem suas 2 ou 3 horas de jogo (dependendo do tempo q vc vai levar nos puzzles) de pura qualidade, espero q essa review tenha encorajado ou pelo menos ter mudado de opini√£o sobre jogo, at√© mais!

Excellent game design in terms of how it layers concepts and ensures users grasp key concepts before they progress out of the rooms that teach those concepts. A little bit of black humour that's pretty funny, and yet there's still nothing in here that makes it unsuitable for children, so it's a good game for introducing younger players to puzzle-solving.
Fun game, good puzzles and story.
